author: woonsan
msg: JS2-946: Refactoring wicket base classes for j2-admin.
Because Wicket portlet support has improved a lot since the base admin portlet was introduced, we don't have any reason to keep it.
(For example, init params or portlet config is available without any special treatment in the our own base portlet.)
So, I removed AdminWicketPortlet and changed to use the default WicketPortlet.
